io.getstream.client.service

Interface AggregatedActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatedActivityServiceImpl

    public interface AggregatedActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>
    Provide methods to interact with Aggregated activities of subtype of BaseActivity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StreamResponse<AggregatedActivity<T>> getActivities()
      List aggregated activities.
      StreamResponse<AggregatedActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter)
      List aggregated activities.

    • Method Detail

      • getActivities

        StreamResponse<AggregatedActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    StreamClientException
        List aggregated activities.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter out the activities. Limited to 25 items by default.
        Returns:
        List of aggregated activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getActivities

        StreamResponse<AggregatedActivity<T>> getActivities()
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    StreamClientException
        List aggregated activities.
        Returns:
        List of aggregated activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
